rows.label: qst650504_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, Archsage see friend come bearing
Nopon Summons, Pt. 2! Is that meaning
friend come prepared for anything?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0002
rows.name: Should I be worried...?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0003
rows.name:
New challenges "Otherworldly Fighter"
and "Poisoned Eden" are tough as nails!
Need every preparation in book!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0004
rows.name:
Otherworldly fighter...?
Whoever they are, that does
sound like a challenge...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0005
rows.name:
That one is self-explanatory.
Friend try, friend understand.
Hopefully friend enjoy!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0006
rows.name:
But for Poisoned Eden
challenge, Archsage offer
teensy bit of free advice.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0007
rows.name:
Setting is this: poison
monster appear suddenly in
spring on certain island!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0008
rows.name: What kind of poison monster...?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0009
rows.name:
Name is Cloud Sea Befouler Ioth,
and, true to name, he befoul pure
spring so now it deadly and stinky!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0010
rows.name:
No place in battle is safe! Have to
combat poison and enemies! Challenge
is very high-level tough one!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, all right, but is it
even possible to beat...?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0012
rows.name: Abso-doodly-lutely!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0013
rows.name:
You see, Nopon Archsage has
prepared special anti-toxin
swamp combat gear for friends.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0014
rows.name:
Oh, nice one! Does it work
something like a salvage suit?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, not quite. Salvage suit very
constricting, cannot move freely,
so not well suited for battle.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0016
rows.name: Yeah, you're probably right.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0017
rows.name:
Therefore, outfits that Nopon Archsage
prepare not only mitigate poison, but
also afford complete freedom of move!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0018
rows.name: And you'll just let us have them?!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0019
rows.name:
I would love nothing more! However, that
got kiboshed by Orderly, who say best
to trade for Flawless Noponstone...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0020
rows.name: Oh, I see... Trading it is, then...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0021
rows.name:
But though however! Nopon
Archsage really want friends
to get them! Definitely for sure!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0022
rows.name: All right, we'll do our best.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0023
rows.name:
But though however... Nopon
Archsage ask friends please
to not get too angry.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0024
rows.name: Huh? Why would we get angry?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0025
rows.name:
I mention anti-poison properties before,
but material with that property actually
terribly expensive in current market...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0026
rows.name:
Nopon Archsage is of course big player,
but even using all influence, could
only lay wings on bits and scraps.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0027
rows.name:
When make clothes for all
friends... surface area per
person turn out... somewhat small.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0028
rows.name: Small...? How small are we talking?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0029
rows.name: About worth of swimsuit.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0030
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Swimsuit?!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0031
rows.name: Indeed. Swimsuit.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0032
rows.name:
So Homura, Nia, and all
the other guys would be
wearing...swimsuits...?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0033
rows.name: Rex's interest is piqued?

rows.label: qst650504_msg0034
rows.name:
Well, I mean, uh,
maybe, I guess, but...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0035
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]No, what am I saying?! They'll
strangle me if they find out!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0036
rows.name:
Please to calm Rex's self.
Surely will be fine.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0037
rows.name:
Saying word "swimsuit" is just slip of
tongue of Archsage... Correct term is
"special anti-toxin swamp combat gear"!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0038
rows.name:
If not wear, then take
poison damage. Is quite
fearsome damage, as well.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0039
rows.name: Friends would die in ten seconds, tops.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0040
rows.name:
I'm still not sure everyone
will be on board with this...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0041
rows.name:
It only way to clear challenge.
There no way around.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0042
rows.name: ...Right, fine.

rows.label: qst650504_msg0043
rows.name:
We'll do our best to collect Flawless
Noponstone so we can get the special
anti-toxin swamp combat gear...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0044
rows.name:
...Then I'll do my best to convince
everyone to actually put on the special
anti-toxin swamp combat gear...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0045
rows.name:
...And then we'll do our
best to take out that
Cloud Sea Befouler Ioth!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0046
rows.name:
That is all that Nopon
Archsage ask for!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0047
rows.name:
Knowing Rex, is just matter of time
before challenge crumple like wet
tissue during allergy season!

rows.label: qst650504_msg0048
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] For sake of Rex, probably best to not
mention that determined combatant can
clear challenge even without gear...

rows.label: qst650504_msg0049
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] ...Did he just say something?
